name: DepraviA EgrigorI
description:
This is a sequel to "DepraviA-Side-scrolling hardcore Ryona action where Angelica, the war maiden meets terrible eyes" released in 2014.
It is a content that you can enjoy even if you have not played the previous work. You can enjoy it more if you play the previous work.

■ Story
Serenia, an angel of memory loss, wakes up in a village destroyed by the devil.
She wants to know who she is
To find out why you are fighting the devil
For the girl Rebecca to protect
Step into a harsh battle covered in blood, flesh and semen.

■ Game overview
Manipulate the angel Serenia to fight the brutal hellish demons,
Side-scrolling hardcore Ryona action game.
Destroy the demons with various throwing weapons, hovering, kick climbs, attack magic, fallen angels, and more!
Ryona, there is no mercy on grotesque expressions.

・ Damage undressing system
For each damage, armor or bikini armor → black underwear → naked knee socks,
If you receive further damage, you will be defeated and the "on-the-spot defeat animation" will be played.
The game is over with zero remaining machines, or continue
If you refuse, animation specification CG or still image CG will be displayed.

・ Fallen angel "Obscenity" that is safe even if you are not good at action games
Serenia can "fallen" at any time.
Fallen angels will not take damage from enemies,
Increases movement speed and weapon performance.
But for angels, "fallen angel" is a mortal sin.

・ Multi-end system
It branches into 5 types of endings according to the clear rank of each stage.
There is different CG for each ending.

・ Equipped with grotesque filter function
So that even people who are not good at cruel depiction can enjoy it
You can optionally hide the cruel depiction and make it a mosaic display.
However, please note that the mosaic display requires machine specifications.
We recommend that you check the operation with the trial version before purchasing.

・ Difficulty levels of "EASY", "NORMAL", and "HARD" can be set at the start of the game.

・ CG viewing mode, recollection mode, animation playback mode available

・ Key config / gamepad compatible (Xbox controller operation confirmed)
